description.narrative: Field offices establishes and / or strengthen local partnerships in Education, taking advantage of the local opportunities, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Access To Quality Learning Opportunities (Covid), Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2019, UNICEF will have contributed to ensuring that children and adolescents (particularly the most excluded) are attending and remaining within educational facilities and that these latter are improving their quality of teaching and educational content, using a rights, gender, adolescent development, intercultural and bilingual approach.

participating-org.narrative: COMITATO INTERNAZIONALE PER LO SVIL DEI POPOLI

sector.narrative: Provision of (formal and non-formal) multiple-levels or alternative pathways of education (including in temporary learning spaces)
System strengthening - inclusive education for other vulnerable children poorest quintile, ethnic/linguistic minorities, migrant children, non-citizens/undocumented children etc.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Field offices establishes and / or strengthen local partnerships in Education, taking advantage of the local opportunities

description.narrative: Through its field offices, UNICEF managed to expand the cooperation framework to 22/24 states of the country, establishing new partnerships and securing existing ones, addressing all levels of the education system, educational agencies, as well as learning spaces in communities through local partners, ensuring operational coordination, response to emergencies generated by natural events or armed conflicts, ensuring operational coordination, as well as learning spaces in communities through local partners, ensuring operational coordination, response to emergencies generated by natural events or war conflicts and identifying opportunities to strengthen the educational system with quality for the most vulnerable. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/01/2022
